ITEM.szItemDesc: Made with a synthetic frame and with hammerless action, this is obviously a competitor to the Glock pistols.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If it is good enough for James Bond, it is surely good enough for you. Commemorative models available on order.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A hunting rifle using Germany's WW-II rifle caliber.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The bolt-action system of the old Mauser Kar98k lives on in this hunting rifle. Comes with a 7x magnification scope.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Variant of the AKMS, which is a variant of the standard AKM. Was made shorter for special units and paratroopers. U-shaped buttplate of folding stock allows folding/unfolding while a magazine is inserted.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This even more shortened variant of the AKM comes with a folding stock that allows folding/unfolding while a magazine is in the gun. It was developed for paratroopers and special units, and is quite functional despite the rather unusual foregrip.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A Colt semiautomatic chambered for the 10mm Auto cartridge.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Colt's entry into the 10mm pistol market. All you expect from a Colt pistol, and more.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The SCAR is FN's newest offering into the military armament scene. The "H" stands for "Heavy", and refers to this version firing the 7.62mm NATO round. This is the sniper variant.
FN's latest addition to the SCAR family is the "L" or Light version, chambered in 5.56mm NATO. This is the sniper variant.
The Advanced Combat Rifle fires a small armor penetrating fin stabilized dart over a considerable range.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Prototype of a new generation of assault rifles, the Steyr ACR fires fin stabilized darts. This is the future weapon of choice.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The SCAR is FN's newest offering into the military armament scene. The "WP" refers to this version firing the 7.62mm WP round. CQC denotes the shortest version for fighting in dense terrain.
The SCAR is FN's newest offering into the military armament scene. The "WP" refers to this version firing the 7.62mm WP round. This is the sniper variant.
This CQC version of the SCAR-L has been converted to fire the 6.8mm SPC round.
This sniper variant of the SCAR-L has been converted for the new 6.8x43mm SPC round.
Yet another version of the H&K MP5, chambered in .40 S&W.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The more popular of the new caliber MP5's, this is the .40 S&W version

ITEM.szItemDesc: Barrett's entry into the 6.8mm SPC rifle market. A strong and sturdy rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not what you usually expect when you hear 'Barrett', but rest assured that this 6.8mm SPC rifle has the usual high quality and precision of any other Barrett rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Bushmaster M4A3, chambered for the new 6.8mm SPC round.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Bushmaster's famous M4A3, now in 6.8mm SPC. As an added bonus, this is the military/LE full-auto variant.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Robinson Armament XCR-1 is just another M4 clone in 6.8mm SPC.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Another new entry on the 6.8mm SPC market, the XCR-1 comes with a folding stock, which looks a bit unusual on a M4 clone, but works very well.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Standard sidearm of the German Army during WW-II. It is also known as the "Luger".
ITEM.szBRDesc: A somewhat complicated pistol for the serious gun collector. Be careful when taking it apart. Call us for spare parts.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The reduced snag version of the P226 pistol.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Reliability and ease of use are key features of this swiss made handgun. Improved with the SIG-Anti-Snag system.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A version of the P226, chambered in .40 S&W, with rounded edges to reduce snag and facilitate easier concealed carry.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A stainless steel slide and the SIG-Anti-Snag system (for easier concealed carrying) are improvements over the standard version.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Dyneema UD full composite helmets provide the highest degree of protection at less weight than alternative materials, against both flying shrapnel and bullets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: "BOOM! Headshot!" Who cares? With this helmet you are protected from bullets and you'll still score with the ladies.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Produced under license by several companies, Dyneema fabric is 40 percent stronger than Kevlar.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Some wearers describe Dyneema fabric leggings as uncomfortable; however, stopping a bullet with one's unprotected groin would be considerably less enjoyable.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Dyneema UD-based vests provide maximum protection at an extremely low weight. Together with the high flexibility of Dyneema UD, this translates into high wearing comfort for the individual user, ensuring that mercs actually wear them on duty.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Very Light vest that still offers the protection of its Heavy counterparts. Don't leave home without one!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Currently in service throughout the world with Bomb Disposal Teams, the EOD Bomb Disposal Suit is a state-of-the-art garment specifically designed to give the highest level of protection with the maximum comfort and flexibility to the user.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The EOD helmet is a state-of-the-art garment specifically designed to give the highest level of protection with the maximum comfort and flexibility to the user.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Currently in service throughout the world with Bomb Disposal Teams, the EOD Bomb Disposal Suit is a state-of-the-art garment specifically designed to give the highest level of protection with the maximum comfort and flexibility to the user.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Unless you have a higly skilled explosives expert on your team, or have shares in a wheelchair producing company, this piece is a must for every self respecting merc.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Currently in service throughout the world with Bomb Disposal Teams, the PRO EOD Bomb Disposal Suit is a state-of-the-art garment specifically designed to give the highest level of protection with the maximum comfort and flexibility to the user.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Unless you have a higly skilled explosives expert on your team, or have shares in a bodybag producing company, this piece is a must for every self respecting merc.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Either as a companion to the Ghillie suit or on its own, the Ghillie Hood camouflages your most important piece of equipment: your head.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The finishing touch for your ghillie suit. Also usefull to keep the sun out of your eyes and as mosquito net.

ITEM.szItemDesc: High Quality Jute Thread is sewn directly on to Military BDU trousers. The sewn on Jute thread covers the back and the front.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Unless you plan to wear jeans under your Ghillie suit, these pants are a must have if you are going for a covert approach.

ITEM.szItemDesc: High Quality Jute Thread is sewn directly on to a Military BDU 4 pocket coat. The sewn on Jute thread covers the entire jacket in the front and the back, and has an attached hood.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Whether you are spying on that cute looking girl next door, or sneaking up to that perfect spot overlooking an enemy base, this vest will make sure nobody sees you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The most demanding ballistic requirements can be met by a helmet made from a specially formed Twaron laminate. Its low weight makes it much more comfortable to wear than the traditional steel helmet.
ITEM.szBRDesc: One of the best helmets money can buy! Contact us if you want them in blue for that genuine "UN-look".

ITEM.szItemDesc: These leg protectors are made from high tensile para-aramid fiber.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Protect your lower half from small arms fire and fragmentation damage with a pair of Twaron trousers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Twaron Microfilament in bullet resistant vests makes protective clothing lighter, more flexible, and easier to wear.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The use of Twaron CT Microfilament in bullet resistant vests makes protective clothing lighter, more flexible, and easier to wear. In short, the most efficient protection system on the market today.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Helmet has been treated with Compound-18 for added ballistic protection.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Catching a bullet high and inside ruins anyone's day. Prevent it with a C-18 treated helmet.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The tensile strength of these Dyneema leggings has been improved by a treatment with Compound-18.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Contrary to what you see in the movies, there really is no 'safe place' on the human body to get shot. These treated trousers are worth the investment.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Permeation with Compound-18 boosts this vest's capacity for resisting trauma from bullets, fragments and other battlefield detritus.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This treated Dyneema vest prohibits painful penetrating trauma.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A treated ballistic helmet, because your head is worth it.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A treated ballistic helmet, because your head is worth it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Treatment with C-18 has augmented these leggings' ability to stop career ending knee and hip wounds.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Treatment with C-18 has augmented these leggings' ability to stop career ending knee and hip wounds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The aramid fibers in this vest have been significantly strengthened by the addition of Compound-18.
ITEM.szBRDesc: C-18 has vastly improved the protective capacity of this armor.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Coating with Crepitus goo makes this item the ultimate in protective head gear.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Coating with Crepitus goo makes this item the ultimate in protective head gear.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Complete saturation with crepitus fluid bolsters the defensive capability of these bonded armor leggings.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Complete saturation with crepitus fluid bolsters the defensive capability of these bonded armor leggings.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Looking at a pile of alien amniotic fluid, my first thought wouldn't have been "Hey, I wonder if smearing this on my body armor will improve its performance?" There are rewards for creativity and improvisation after all.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Ballistic inserts, available seperately from Bobby Ray's, would be the perfect addition to this already formidable coated armor.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Keep your brains inside your skull where they belong with this coated helmet.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Keep your brains inside your skull where they belong with this coated helmet.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Twaron leggings dipped in bug slime - yeah, I said it.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Coated leg protectors keep your stock body in mint condition.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A liberal application of alien goo has strengthened the protective properties of this vest.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This crepitus coated vest will keep unwanted foreign objects from entering your chest cavity at high speed.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An alternative to ceramic inserts that is cheaper and lighter, but also a bit less effective.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Can't afford ceramic inserts for your troops? This cost effective alternative might be of interest to you: the T-15 titanium plate comes in different shapes and sizes to fit any ballistic carrier.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Not just for unruly kids with skateboards and spray cans, these kneepads will prevent unwanted damage to your, you guessed it, knees.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not just for unruly kids with skateboards and spray cans, these kneepads will prevent unwanted damage to your, you guessed it, knees.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This helmet will protect you from small caliber rounds effectively, providing maximal stealth. For those really quiet operatives only.
With this vest an operative will remain uncovered for the most time, but vulnerable to large caliber weapons.
No need to learn ninjutsu. An operative wearing these leggings will become ninja right away.
This camouflaged kevlar vest is the best solution for any recon activity.
This camouflaged guardian vest is the best solution for any recon activity.
This camouflaged twaron vest is the best solution for any recon activity.
Comfortable and camouflaged, these kevlar leggings are made for reconnaissance in the first place.
Comfortable and camouflaged, these twaron leggings are made for reconnaissance in the first place.
Such vests are usually worn by field medics, since they provide some extra space for the equipment they use.
Such vests are usually worn by field medics, since they provide some extra space for the equipment they use.
Such vests are usually worn by field medics, since they provide some extra space for the equipment they use.
Such vests are usually worn by field medics, since they provide some extra space for the equipment they use.
Such vests are usually worn by field medics, since they provide some extra space for the equipment they use.
Nothing like an useful place for First Aid Kit, Canteen or Condoms. With these leggings you'll get it.
Nothing like an useful place for First Aid Kit, Canteen or Condoms. With these leggings you'll get it.
Nothing like an useful place for First Aid Kit, Canteen or Condoms. With these leggings you'll get it.
Nothing like an useful place for First Aid Kit, Canteen or Condoms. With these leggings you'll get it.
For all mechanic and demolitions freaks such upgraded vest is a fulfilled dream.
For all mechanic and demolitions freaks such upgraded vest is a fulfilled dream.
For all mechanic and demolitions freaks such upgraded vest is a fulfilled dream.
For all mechanic and demolitions freaks such upgraded vest is a fulfilled dream.
For all mechanic and demolitions freaks such upgraded vest is a fulfilled dream.
Special leggings upgraded to serve mechanic and demolitions operatives better than the standard ones.
Special leggings upgraded to serve mechanic and demolitions operatives better than the standard ones.
Special leggings upgraded to serve mechanic and demolitions operatives better than the standard ones.
Special leggings upgraded to serve mechanic and demolitions operatives better than the standard ones.
This vest seems to be upgraded for purposes of longer field operations and missions.
This vest seems to be upgraded for purposes of longer field operations and missions.
This vest seems to be upgraded for purposes of longer field operations and missions.
This vest seems to be upgraded for purposes of longer field operations and missions.
This vest seems to be upgraded for purposes of longer field operations and missions.
For a person spending too much time on a field duty, these upgraded leggings are definitely his best friend.
For a person spending too much time on a field duty, these upgraded leggings are definitely his best friend.
For a person spending too much time on a field duty, these upgraded leggings are definitely his best friend.
For a person spending too much time on a field duty, these upgraded leggings are definitely his best friend.
This unique upgrade kit can be used to upgrade any standard kevlar helmet to its stealth ops counterpart.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Upgrade your helmet today! From standard kevlar helmet to high-tech stealth operations head protection in no time! This kit includes all the necessary tools for such conversion.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This upgrade kit contains the necessary components and tools to convert a common kevlar vest into the state-of-the-art Stealth Ops vest.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Need a suit for the next stealth mission? If you already have a standard kevlar vest, all you need is this upgrade kit and a few minutes of your time!

ITEM.szItemDesc: All you ever need to upgrade your kevlar leggings to those used by stealth operatives.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Making too much noise while walking around? With this upgrade kit you'll mute your kevlar leggings forever.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This upgrade kit contains the necessary components and tools to convert a kevlar, guardian or twaron vest into camouflaged recon vest.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Make a light, camouflaged recon vest today! With this upgrade kit it's easier than ever!

ITEM.szItemDesc: All you ever need to upgrade your kevlar or twaron leggings to those used by recon operatives.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Uncomfortable leggings? No camouflage pattern? With this upgrade kit your kevlar or twaron leggings might become first class recon gear!

ITEM.szItemDesc: This upgrade kit contains the necessary components and tools to convert a kevlar, guardian, twaron, spectra or dyneema vest into medic vest.
ITEM.szBRDesc: You don't have to worry where to put the first aid kit. With this upgrade kit you'll get enough place for all important medicine you need in your vest.

ITEM.szItemDesc: All you ever need to upgrade your kevlar, twaron, spectra or dyneema leggings to those used by medic operatives.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Get this kit before your buddy bleeds to death and upgrade your leggings today! A serious medic wouldn't neglect this one.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This upgrade kit contains the necessary components and tools to convert a kevlar, guardian, twaron, spectra or dyneema vest into mechanic-demolitions vest.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Never enough room for your tools? Need an extra pocket for the remote bomb trigger? With this upgrade kit your vest will make a difference.

ITEM.szItemDesc: All you ever need to upgrade your kevlar, twaron, spectra or dyneema leggings to those used by mechanic and demolitions operatives.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Ideal upgrade for mechanic and demolitions operatives! More pockets for your tools and demolitions equipment will give you more satisfaction, guaranteed!

ITEM.szItemDesc: This upgrade kit contains the necessary components and tools to convert a kevlar, guardian, twaron, spectra or dyneema vest into field operative vest.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Spending too much time outside? Upgrade your vest using this kit and enjoy more comfort and protection than ever!

ITEM.szItemDesc: All you ever need to upgrade your kevlar, twaron, spectra or dyneema leggings to those used by field operatives.
ITEM.szBRDesc: No matter if you're a professional merc or a kid spending too much time playing outside - this upgrade kit is all your leggings need.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This cover will make your helmet less conspicuous.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Shining brightly helmets are history! One of these camouflaged covers is a perfect upgrade for your helmet.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This cover will make your helmet less conspicuous. It has additional straps which can be used to mount leaves or other greenery to it, providing better camouflage.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Let the grass grow on your head! The straps on this helmet are perfect mount points for any material made by Mother nature.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A sturdy large frame revolver for the .44 Magnum round.
ITEM.szBRDesc: I hate to say it, but Harry Callahan would've looked cooler carrying an Anaconda instead of a Model 29.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Another French quality revolver. Its only drawback is the smaller ammo capacity, compared to a .357 Desert Eagle pistol.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The patented Manurhin MR96 design is a revolution in revolver engineering. The grip - a long-lasting rubber design specific to this revolver - allows continuous firing of the most powerful loads without fatigue.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Yet another fine service pistol from FN.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the civilian version of the new all-black military FNP-9, with the same qualities, of course.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Another pistol from FN. A little bit harder to control due to the heavy trigger-pull, but a bit more reliable if ammo of dubious quality is used.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A new service pistol from FN, this one is a true DAO pistol, which makes it somewhat more reliable, thought the trigger-pull may be a bit much for some people.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Announced in 2007, this new pistol is FN's latest addition to the civilian and law enforcement market.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Brand new in the line of FN's new pistols (Forty-Nine, PRO-9), this one is chambered for the good old and never dying .45ACP-round.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A sturdy .44 Magnum revolver.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Probably the most famous Magnum revolver, due to its appearance in the Dirty Harry movies.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Someone was obviously so impressed by the toy that he made a real one. Go Figure...
ITEM.szBRDesc: Formerly only available as a toy-gun, we can now offer a real version of this stylish gun. Beware of frauds at Ebay, people may try to sell you the toy for real. Only we offer the genuine article.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Mostly based on S&W revolvers, but with a few features of its own, the MR-73 is the backbone of Manurhin's revolver production.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A French police revolver in use with GIGN, the French counter-terrorist unit, which tells alot about the quality of this gun.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A stock with Picatinny rails (so that your M14 or M21 rifle can take advantage of more modern add-ons) and a replacable shoulder stock.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the "Enhanced Battle Rifle" stock. Just drop your M14/M21 system into it, and mount all the modern goodies that do not fit onto the vintage M14.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is the M14 barrel and action dropped into a new stock with Picatinny Rails, to take advantage of more modern add-ons.
The M21 tactical rifle is the sniper version of the M14. An accurate rifle with good stopping power. Somebody dropped this one into the EBR-stock that was originally meant for the M14 rifle.
The short version of the SDASS's predecessor as a combat shotgun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An Italian shotgun for police/military use, especially useful in house clearing. It includes Picatinny Rails on the receiver and the pump-action handle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A new Italian combat shotgun with rails for adding specialized equipment.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is a new Italian shotgun developed for police/military use. It includes Picatinny Rails on the receiver and the pump-action handle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A 10mm pistol based on the Colt Commander design, i.e. with a shorter barrel than the Colt Government models.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Produced from stainless steel and to very tight tolerances, the Kimber Eclipse is a high quality pistol. The Pro II is the intermediate version between the Ultra II and the Custom II, and like the Custom II, it can be equipped with better sights.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Commando Mortar is a 60mm caliber mortar, slightly lighter and faster than the M224.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Commando Mortar is a 60mm caliber mortar, slightly lighter and faster than the M224.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Product Improved version of the M203 fits a lot of rifles, thanks to some ingenious adapters that come with the launcher. Special foregrip available. Cannot shoot grenades of more than standard length.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Everyone wanted a M203, and now they can. The much improved M203PI does not only work with the M16 and M4, but with several European and some Israeli rifles as well.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Russian made pump-action grenade launcher fires 43mm ordnance.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Compact and light-weight, this launcher can quickly dispense a variety of deadly payloads.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An underbarrel mounted grenade launcher for Russian made assault rifles. The GP-30 Obuvka fires 40mm VOG-25 and VOG-25P grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An improved model of the GP-25 Kostyor, the GP-30 Obuvka features a sighting recticle and a recoil buffer to protect the rifle to which it is attached. The GP-30 fires 40mm VOG-25 and VOG-25P grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Anbau-Granatwerfer 36 is an underbarrel grenade launcher for most of HK's modern rifles. Does not fit the short G36C, though.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Need some extra firepower on your G36? This oversized pistol does the trick. Can launch all standard NATO 40mm grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Milkor MGL six-shot 40mm grenade launcher is the world's first mass-produced multi-shot, rapid-fire 40mm hand-held weapon.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Milkor MGL six-shot 40mm grenade launcher is the world's first mass-produced multi-shot, rapid-fire 40mm hand-held weapon. The MGL can fire six shots in less than three seconds, making it essential in dealing with ambush situations and in urban warfare.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Light-weight, retractable 40mm Russian grenade launcher for the grenadier in your squad. The RGM Kastet fires 40mm VOG-25 and VOG-25P grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Living proof that the "Russian concussion" wasn't just the nick-name of the foreign exchange student you dated in college. The RGM Kastet fires 40mm VOG-25 and VOG-25P grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Compared to the XM29, the XM25 dispenses with the complexity and weight of having an integrated Kinetic Energy weapon, and is purely a magazine fed, multi-shot grenade launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Who needs bullets when you have grenades? The XM-25 is the stand alone magazine fed grenade system spawned by the revamped US OICW program. To the enemies of freedom, there is still nowhere to hide.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Operating like a computer triggered Roman candle, Metal Storm's grenade system is perhaps the lightest and least bulky complete multi-shot launcher around.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The AICW comes with an integrated 40mm grenade launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The FN F2000 comes with an integrated 40mm grenade launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The FN F2000 comes with an integrated 40mm grenade launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This model of the Groza comes with an integrated 40mm GP-25 grenade launcher. The GP-25 Kostyor fires 40mm VOG-25 and VOG-25P grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This model of the Groza comes with an integrated 40mm GP-25 Kostyor grenade launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The XM-29 OICW comes with an integrated 20mm grenade launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The XM-29 OICW comes with an integrated 20mm grenade launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A little known underbarrel grenade launcher for Heckler & Kochs older rifles. The drop down barrel can take NATO grenades of any length.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the German equivalent to the American M203 underbarrel grenade launcher. The HK79 is slightly longer and will fit only on older HK rifles. It can fire all NATO 40mm grenades on the market today or tomorrow.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Rocket Propelled Grenade, or RPG, is a cheap, single-shot weapon. It's main purpose to to provide an inexpensive albeit devastating weapon against soft targets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Rocket Propelled Grenade, or RPG, is a cheap, single-shot weapon. It's main purpose is to provide an inexpensive albeit devastating weapon against soft targets.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The RPG-16 was developed in the 1960s, and has better range than the RPG-7.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Once your enemy sees your packing the kind of firepower an RPG provides, have mercy on him and let him run away in fear. Or not.

ITEM.szItemDesc: WARNING: DO NOT AIM AT FACE.
ITEM.szBRDesc: For the times when flowers just don't cut it: say it with high explosive rocket propelled grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A top of the line RPG launcher with improved range and accuracy.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The RPG-27 Tavolga is a further development of rocket propelled grenade launchers, and is endowed with increased range and accuracy.

ITEM.szItemDesc: With this baby, you can turn a pool party into a BBQ. Literally.
ITEM.szBRDesc: With the RPO-A Shmel thermobaric rocket launcher, you can turn a pool party into a BBQ.Literally. NEWS UPDATE: We now stock the improved Shmel-M.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Sure, now that you're done with it, you're just going to throw it away. Whatever happened to recycling?
A standalone M203 grenade launcher mounted to a pistolgrip and buttstock.
ITEM.szBRDesc: After the success the HK69 grenade pistol had with the Special Forces community, Colt decided to issue a standalone grenade launcher as well.

ITEM.szItemDesc: FN Herstal's underbarrel grenade launcher for the SCAR. Obviously developed from the launcher for the F2000.
ITEM.szBRDesc: FN Herstal developed their launcher for the F2000 some more to fit it on the SCAR. Will fire grenades of any length and can use future medium velocity grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A longbarreled standalone M203 grenade launcher mounted to a pistolgrip and retractable buttstock.
ITEM.szBRDesc: KAC decided to copy Colt in making some gear that makes the M203 launcher usable without a rifle. We have decided to stock the longbarreled version.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 923
6 rounds of wadcutter ammo, designed to be used on the gunrange to shoot at paper targets. Still more precise than standard lead ammo, though.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Precisely loaded .38 Special match ammo with wadcutter bullets. When precision is more important than anything else!

ITEM.szItemDesc: These bullets promise to penetrate better than standard hollow points.
ITEM.szBRDesc: New solid copper bullets of hollow point shape! They are better at penetrating than the usual lead-core/brass-jacket hollowpoints.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 8 full metal jacket rounds of 9x18mm Makarov.
12 rounds of full metal jacket ammo in cost effective 9x18mm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This FMJ 9x18mm ammo penetrates much better than standard ball rounds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 20 round SMG mag loaded with full metal jacket ammo.
ITEM.szBRDesc: FMJ rounds, as preferred by the military for defeating light body armor.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 round SMG mag loaded with full metal jacket ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 30 full metal jacket bullets will make a sieve out of most things.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Ammo for the HK UCP pistol.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 20 rounds of armor piercing 4.6mm ammo, usable for both the HK MP7 and the HK UCP.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 20 rounds of AET ammo for the HK UCP pistol.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A magazine with Advanced Energy Transfer ammo for the HK UCP prototype pistol.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of hollowpoint ammo for 6x35mm PDW-class guns.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Here's what you need for your shiny new 6x35mm PDW: 30 rounds tipped with hollowpoint bullets for anti-personnel work.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of FMJ ammo for 6x35mm guns.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 30 full metal jacket rounds for 6x35mm personal defense weapons, if hollowpoints won't do it any longer.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 6 AET rounds of the .44 Mag caliber.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Dirty Harry would have loved these, if they were available back in his time. Well, now they are available to you!

ITEM.szItemDesc: 8 AET rounds for your .44 Magnum semi-automatic.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Advanced high speed rounds that make body armor a joke.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 5 high precision rounds for a Dragunov or other 7.62x54mm rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 7.62x54R Sniper ammo, manufactured to ensure higher precision.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Ammo manufactured to higher standards, made especially for snipers.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 10 rounds of the so-called "Sniper" ammo in 7.62x54R.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 200 round box of 7.62x54 Sniper ammo.
Index 939
An illumination shell for a 60mm mortar.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M721 60mm mortar shell provides illumination on a scale not possible by other means at the achieved range.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A mortar round that delivers a WP-based smokescreen.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M722 smoke round for 60mm mortars produces a dense smokescreen wherever you need it on a battlefield. Great for covering your advance! Be careful of the smoke, though, it is based on WP, and thus may be harmful to unprotected personnel.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 942
Index 943
Index 944
Index 945
A combination of a red dot sight with an aiming laser (including IR).
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you do not want your gun overcrowded with attachments, here is a combination of a red-dot sight with an IR-laser sight. Precludes mounting of scopes, though.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Grippod fits on the lower Picatinny Rail of a lot of modern rifles. Its bipod is not as sturdy as a dedicated one, though.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Your bipod is getting in the way so you can't mount a foregrip? Here's the solution! The Grippod drops two legs out of its bottom at the push of a button.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This old laser aiming device weighs enough to be a weapon (club) in its own right. Fits older HK rifles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Hard to find these days, the eye safety warning on this Aim Point Projector is indicative of its useful range. Fits older HK rifles.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Laser Aiming Module is meant to fit on modern rifle rail interface systems. Though larger and heavier, it has a longer useful range than (Pistol) Trigger Guard mounted types.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Laser Aiming Module is meant to fit on modern rifle rail interface systems. Though larger and heavier, it has a longer useful range than (Pistol) Trigger Guard mounted types.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Laser Aiming Module and tactical flashlight combination is meant to fit on modern rifle rail interface systems.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Laser Aiming Module and tactical flashlight combination is meant to fit on modern rifle rail interface systems.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Mustard Gas bomb features waterproof "horseshoe" snap-off propellant increments and the M734 multi-option fuse. This fuse can be set by hand for a delayed, impact, near-surface, or proximity burst detonation.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Mustard Gas mortar shell features waterproof "horseshoe" snap-off propellant increments and the M734 multi-option fuse. WARNING: this item may release a noxious odour upon detonation.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A six-shot clip of 20mm high explosive air burst grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A six-shot magazine of 20mm high explosive air burst grenades. Fun for the whole family!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Ever had that occasion when one mustard gas grenade just wasn't enough? Amuse your friends and alarm your enemies with not one, but 6 burstable 20mm Grenades of WWI goodness.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Take a lesson from the Central Powers in WWI and don't fire these shells into prevailing tradewinds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Mask your advance or cover your withdrawal with these six smoke grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Mask your advance or cover your withdrawal with these smoke grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six grenades siphon the air out of their blast radius, leaving enemies helpless on the ground.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These grenades siphon the air out of their blast radius, leaving enemies helpless on the ground.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Before deploying these six grenades indoors or in a confined space, remember: gas takes the shape of its container.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Before deploying these grenades indoors or in a confined space, remember: gas takes the shape of its container.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six shells will destroy enemy personnel and material with super-heated blast wave.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These shells will destroy enemy personnel and material with super-heated blast wave.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six 25mm HEAB grenades arm in mid-air to prevent harm to the user.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These 25mm HEAB grenades arm in mid-air to prevent harm to the user.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six grenades are filled with an invariably fatal blistering agent.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These grenades are filled with an invariably fatal blistering agent.

ITEM.szItemDesc: When a Shotgun is not enough: while short on range, these grenade will open anything short of a bank vault.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Sometimes your lockpick expert gets tired or dead. For those times, a clip of door breaching grenades works wonders.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Leave them breathless, literally, with six 25mm stun grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Leave them breathless, literally, with a 25mm stun grenade.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A clip of grenades loaded with multiple steel darts for close combat.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Open up with a shower of armour piercing metal shards and your opponents will be cut down to size.. Literally.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Turn the air in the surrounding atmospheric air into a lethal firestorm with themobaric ordinance. Six rounds of superheated fun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Turn the air in the surrounding atmospheric air into a lethal firestorm with themobaric ordinance.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is a six-shot grenade cylinder filled with fragmentation grenades. When fired from the 40mm grenade launcher each grenade will ignite its encased TNT after a short delay.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is a six-shot grenade cylinder filled with fragmentation grenades. Each grenade features a time-delayed firing device to ignite its encased TNT. Fired from the MGL Mk.1 grenade launcher, this round can provide great lethal coverage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Mustard Gas is known for its blistering and burning effect. Now you can multiply this effect by six with this cylinder.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Disclaimer: This product is classed as a chemical weapon and is banned by the Geneva convention. Sold for pest control purposes only!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Mustard Gas is known for its blistering and burning effect. With this round you will make your opponents cough out most of their internal organs.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Disclaimer: This product is classed as a chemical weapon and is banned by the Geneva convention. Sold for pest control purposes only!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Now they see you, now they don't. When properly employed, this six-shot 40mm smoke grenade cylinder will leave your opposition thinking they're dealing with Houdini himself.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When fired from a MGL Mk.1, the grenades in this six-shot cylinder will quickly release a cloud of smoke that will aid in battlefield entry or withdrawal.

ITEM.szItemDesc: When fired from the MGL Mk.1, the six projectiles contained in this cylinder will create a massive vacuum that will leave your enemies gasping for air.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This six-shot MGL Mk.1 grenade cylinder contains projectile rounds that will create a massive vacuum, depriving the surrounding impact area of oxygen. Anyone standing within the detonated area will be left gasping, as waves of air rush back into its core.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Also known as CS gas, this substance is ideal for crowd control, but it works well only on crowds that are not wearing gas masks.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Tear Gas cylinder contains nasty substance that certainly is not odorless. In fact, after walking through a cloud of this stuff you will smell like you just chopped a million raw onions. No, forget that, it's worse.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This grenade works great for crowd control, but it tends to require more clean up afterwards than standard Tear Gas.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Thermobaric grenades provide a better kill probability than standard HE grenades. An overpressure blast uses atmospheric oxygen once the volatile liquid inside the grenade spreads and ignites.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 43mm High Explosive grenades will fit nicely in your GM-94 grenade launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: High Explosive grenades for the GM-94. Sold only in packs of four since we here at Bobby Ray's want to make sure that you won't go into battle with a half-empty weapon.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 43mm Mustard Gas grenades will fit nicely in your GM-94 grenade launcher. Warning: Inhaling contents will cause a painful death.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This product is classed as a chemical weapon and is banned by the Geneva convention. Sold for pest control purposes only!

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 43mm Smoke grenades will fit nicely in your GM-94 grenade launcher. When you need cover, fire off a couple of these.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Smoke rounds for the GM-94. Sold only in packs of four since we here at Bobby Ray's want to make sure that you won't go into battle with a half-empty weapon.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Four 43mm stun grenades for the GM-94 launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Crowd of rioters or room full of hyperactive children (we kid, of course), a stun grenade will take the wind and the fight right out of them.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Drop 4 CS gas grenades on your target and reduce them to blubbering wrecks.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Drop 4 CS gas grenades on your target and reduce them to blubbering wrecks.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Perfect for those times when you need to make a big entrance.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A rocket propelled grenade is perfect for those times when you need to make a big entrance.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Works exactly like a can opener, but on tanks. Oh, and it's a bit louder.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Works exactly like a can opener, but on tanks. Oh, and it's a bit louder.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Guaranteed to blow your enemies away.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Guaranteed to blow your enemies away.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Teach them the hard way that flammable and inflammable mean the same damn thing.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Arguably one of Russia's most deadly exports, next to the Vodka itself, a bottle of alcohol with a cloth fuse is, like a good Vodka, simple and powerful.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 40mm HE grenade will fit the GP-30 launcher on your Kalashnikov.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 40mm HE shell for Russian grenade launchers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This nasty little device contains TNT and a little something extra that makes it explode in mid-air, spreading destruction to a wider range than a regular 40mm grenade.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 40mm jumping grenade - a few hundred bucks. Grenade launcher - a few thousand. Seeing your enemies' expression once they see this little bugger merrily hopping towards them - priceless.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This cylinder of 40mm fuel-air grenades transforms the user into a walking, talking WMD.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This cylinder of 40mm fuel-air grenades transforms the user into a walking, talking WMD.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Three rounds of High Explosive (HE) death configured for the AICW's hi-tech integrated launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Take the load off the team grenadier with Metal Storm's 40mm multi shot grenade system. Three rounds of High Explosive (HE) death configured for the AICW's hi-tech integrated launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Intended for riot control, we're sure you'll find some other use for this 3 round stack of 40mm tear gas.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Take the load off the team grenadier with Metal Storm's 40mm multi shot grenade system. Three rounds of tear gas should be enough to quickly pacify any threat

ITEM.szItemDesc: Stack contains 3 rounds of 40mm Smoke, best used for covering infiltrations and extractions.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Quickly lay down a long wall of blinding smoke with a three round stack of 40mm Metal Storm enabled 40mm smoke grenades.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This stack contains 3 rounds of 40mm Mustard Gas. Caution: Check wind before use.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These things shouldn't exist, but here we have a three round stack of 40mm grenades containing what appears to be Mustard Gas. Where in the world did these things come from, we won't tell.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This stack contains 3 rounds of 40mm Thermobaric. Caution: Check range before use.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Overpressure and heat, instead of shrapnel, is the prime killing effect of Thermobaric explosives. This new way to clear a large space, is packaged in the new Metal Storm 40mm multi-shot grenade stack for the AICW.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Stack contains 3 rounds of 40mm stun. For those times when you need the target down but alive.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Knock the wind out of any line of infantry with this compact 3 round stack of stun grenades made possible by Metal Storm's patented electronic firing system. Caution: these are only stun weapons, they only buy time.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These six shells will destroy enemy personnel and material with super-heated napalm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These shells will destroy enemy personnel and material with super-heated napalm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Turn the surrounding area into a lethal firestorm with napalm ordinance. Six rounds of superheated fun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Turn the surrounding area into a lethal firestorm with napalm ordinance. Six rounds of superheated fun.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This grenade works great for crowd control, but it tends to require more clean up afterwards than standard Tear Gas.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Nothing's beats super-heated napalm for burning off some calories.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This cylinder of 40mm napalm grenades transforms the user into a walking, talking WMD.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This cylinder of 40mm napalm grenades transforms the user into a walking, talking WMD.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This stack contains 3 rounds of 40mm Napalm. Caution: Check range before use.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This super hot way to clear a large space is packaged in the new Metal Storm 40mm multi-shot grenade stack for the AICW.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Flashbangs are used to confuse and disorient a potential threat for up to five seconds. They work best indoors, and are only partially effective outdoors at night.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The flash of light from this grenade momentarily activates all sensory pigment in the retina, making vision impossible for approximately five seconds until the eye restores the pigment to its original, unstimulated state.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An illumination grenade for nightfighting.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M583A1 illumination grenade.provides battlefield illumination from most 40mm grenade launchers. Longer range and more candlepower than a breaklight!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Index 996
This piece of metal lets you fit a 75rnd drum onto several AK-rifles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This piece of metal lets you fit a 75rnd drum onto several AK-rifles. Permanent installing required.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Russian reflex sight sits on a sidemount-bracket to fit onto AK-style receivers.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Kobra is the answer to the needs of Russian special forces operatives who need a gunsight for fast target acquisition. Fits most AK rifles instead of a scope.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Russian standard scope that fits many AK-type rifles. Magnification is 4x.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Russian PSO-1 fits only on rifles with an AK-style receiver, due to the unique side-mount. It has a 4x magnification.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Better than the PSO-1 (Magnification is double as high), this scope is often used on Russian DMRs and sniper rifles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you have an older style Russian rifle and need a highpower scope, than this is your best choice. Magnification is 8x.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 5.56mm weapons to allow for the use of the 100-rd Beta C-Mags.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 5.56mm weapons to allow for the use of the 100-rd Beta C-Mags.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 9mm weapons to allow for the use of the 100-rd Beta C-Mags.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This special adapter can be attached to certain 9mm weapons to allow for the use of the 100-rd Beta C-Mags.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Standard equipment for keeping those pesky muzzle flashes from giving away your position.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Standard equipment for keeping those pesky muzzle flashes from giving away your position.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Trijicon Advanced Combat Optical Gunscope with 4x magnification, an additional DOCTER Reflex Sight has been mounted atop the eyepiece for faster target acquisition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Trijicon Advanced Combat Gunscope with 4x magnification, adapter-mounted rear holosight for close-combat sighting. Includes flat top adapter, backup iron sights and dust cover.

ITEM.szItemDesc: When a standard laser sight isn't enough, the LAM-200 adds Infrared to increase nighttime visibility.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The LAM-200 is a combination of Laser, IR-Laser, visible Combat-Light and IR-Combat-Light. Essential for night operations specialists.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This reflex dual-illuminated advanced combat gun sight is the new standard for instant any-light shooting accuracy.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This reflex dual-illuminated advanced combat gun sight is the new standard for instant any-light shooting accuracy. It gives you maximum accuracy and true-to-life targeting, instantly.

ITEM.szItemDesc: With this scope you can give precision performance to a bolt-action rifle, AR-10, FAL, G3, SCAR-H, or M-14 serving in the Designated Marksman role.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Dramatically improve your targeting accuracy with this extremely versatile battle scope. Attachable to most rifles, you'll quickly appreciate this scope's accurate windage adjustment, a range-finder precision scale, and coated optics.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This new stock will allow you to raise your weapon faster, but you may have a slightly harder time hitting things.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Get your weapon up before the other guy when you attach this new stock. Usable with most fixed-stock firearms.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This new stock will allow you to raise your weapon faster, but you may have a slightly harder time hitting things.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Get your weapon up before the other guy when you attach this new stock. Usable with most fixed-stock firearms.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Dropped.
A special hand grip that can be attached to most SMGs and rifles to enhance burst and selective fire accuracy.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A special hand grip that can be attached to most SMGs and rifles to enhance burst and selective fire accuracy.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A large sound suppressor that can be fitted to most carbines and assault rifles. While it will reduce the muzzle noise and flash, it's still far from silent.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A large sound suppressor that can be fitted to most carbines and assault rifles. Caution: This item is not 100 percent effective on its own. Use it in conjunction with cold-loaded or subsonic ammunition to achieve a greatly reduced muzzle volume.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Whoops. Somebody dropped their cash. Bad for them, good for you.
These might be worth something on the black market.
Perfect for digging your own grave, or hitting people over the head (and then dig their grave).
ITEM.szBRDesc: If it was good in Verdun, it'll still be good enough for you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Will we ever finally be rid of Tetris?
Looks like someone recorded some home movies on this thing. They're actually fairly entertaining, if you like watching paint dry.
15 volts of chemical goodness.
A can of Esso brand oil. Funny, you don't remember seeing any Esso stations around here.
ITEM.szBRDesc: We believe it is safe to say that this oil can is uncontestably the best oil can on the market today. (One year warranty, void if tampered with)

ITEM.szItemDesc: This medal seems to be what passes for a reward for service around here. Maybe there's a chocolately centre?
This thing just crashes with a blue screen when you boot it up. It might be the humidity. It might just be Windows.
A torn scrap of cloth. Completely devoid of snot.
The finest in Central American cigars. So how did they end up here?
The third generation of nightvision gear is mostly used by the military. Hightech armies use milspec versions that are more rugged than earlier generation NVG.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Want to see through the night as well as most American soldiers? Then this NVG is for you. With a state-of-the-art microchannel tube, you'll get the drop on everyone.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Light amplification is not better than in generation III, but image resolution is better and halos around bright objects are reduced, resulting in a better overall picture.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from the assembly line, the first NVG of generation IV. Just what you need when a clear picture makes the difference between a dead enemy and collateral damage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: For the unhappy trigger-happy folks: Just attach the ACME Trigger Group to your favourite assault rifle and enjoy simple and effective 3-round burst fire.
ITEM.szBRDesc: For the unhappy trigger-happy folks out there, we are proud to present the ACME Trigger Group! Marksmanship skill too low? Tired of firing too many bullets in autofire? Simply attach the ACME Trigger Group to your favourite assault rifle and enjoy simple and effective 3-round burst fire.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Military Urban Camo Compact includes several grey nuanced facial paints, a mirror, and a manual on the proper use and care of your camo compact.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Military Urban Camo Compact includes several grey nuanced facial paints, and a mirror. This long-lasting, non-running, facial paint can be easily removed with soap and water. The kit also includes a manual that outlines the proper use and care of your compact.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Military Desert Camo Compact includes light brown, tan and white cream-based facial paint, a mirror, and a manual on the proper use and care of your camo compact.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Military Desert Camo Compact includes light brown, tan and white cream based facial paint, and a mirror. This long-lasting, non-running, facial paint can be easily removed with soap and water. The kit also includes a manual that outlines the proper use and care of your compact.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A small scope for mounting onto short-ranged guns like submachine guns, shotguns or revolvers. Optional mounts for a few autoloaders available.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A small scope for mounting onto short-ranged guns like submachine guns, shotguns or revolvers. Optional mounts for a few autoloaders available.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Combat gun scope with 4x magnification.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A combat gun scope with 4x magnification, including two-piece adapter-mount for eyepiece-mounted accessories.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A short barrel to change the SCAR-L into the CQC version.
A long barrel to change the SCAR-L into the SV version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This long barrel changes your SCAR-L into the sniper variant.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A short barrel to change the SCAR-H into the CQC version.
A long barrel to change the SCAR-H into the SV version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This long barrel changes your SCAR-H into the sniper variant.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This kit contains the necessary parts to convert your SCAR-L to the 6.8mm SPC caliber.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you need to convert your SCAR-L to the new 6.8x43mm SPC caliber, here are the necessary parts: A new CQC-barrel, bolt, and triggergroup with magazine well.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This kit contains the necessary parts to convert your SCAR-L to the 6.8mm SPC caliber sniper variant.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you need to convert your SCAR-L to the new 6.8x43mm SPC caliber, here are the necessary parts: A new SV-barrel, bolt, and triggergroup with magazine well.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The leftover parts after you converted your SCAR-L to another caliber. Of course, with these you can change the gun back again.
The leftover parts after you converted your SCAR-L to another caliber. Of course, with these you can change the gun back again.
A short barrel to change the SCAR-68 into the CQC version.
A long barrel to change the SCAR-68 into the SV version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This long barrel changes your SCAR-68 into the sniper variant.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This kit contains the necessary parts to convert your SCAR-H to the 7.62x39mm caliber.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you need to convert your SCAR-H to the Russian 7.62x39mm caliber, here are the necessary parts: A new CQC-barrel, bolt, and triggergroup with magazine well.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This kit contains the necessary parts to convert your SCAR-H to the 7.62x39mm caliber long-barreled variant.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you need to convert your SCAR-H to the Russian 7.62x39mm caliber, here are the necessary parts: A new SV-barrel, bolt, and triggergroup with magazine well.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The leftover parts after you converted your SCAR-H to another caliber. Of course, with these you can change the gun back again.
The leftover parts after you converted your SCAR-H to another caliber. Of course, with these you can change the gun back again.
A short barrel to change the SCAR-WP into the CQC version.
A long barrel to change the SCAR-WP into the SV version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This long barrel changes your SCAR-WP into the sniper variant.

ITEM.szItemDesc: .40 S&W emerged in the late 1990s as "middle of the road" round with more stopping power than the 9mm and more penetration than the .45ACP.
ITEM.szBRDesc: .40 S&W is a popular ammunition among many law enforcement officers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This hollow point ammo gives increased punch to the the .40 S&W's already significant stopping power.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The expansion power of HP adds substance to this powerful pistol ammunition.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of .40 S&W full metal jacketed ammo.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Punch holes in the competition with these handy FMJ rounds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A fruitful marriage of penerating power and game-stopping expansion in .40 caliber.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Armored targets will go down and stay down when you tag them with this potent AET round.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If 30 rounds of Glaser Safety ammo fail to make your point, the conversation wasn't worth having to begin with.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Thirty rounds of frangible fun. All of the man-stopping power, none of the over-penetration.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of match grade .40 S&W; added range with the same mild recoil.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Competitive shooting or life and death struggle, match ammo extends your reach.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The most renowned silent, fast projectile weapon of Ninpo Taijutsu.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Silent, swift, and effective with razor-sharp edges.

ITEM.szItemDesc: In the right hands this is one of the most dangerous and compact weapons in martial arts.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is one of the favoured weapons of Ninpo Taijutsu.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is the pride of the samurai.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is a rare Japanese masterpiece, decorated with dragons. It can chop through bamboo like a hot knife through butter!

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 42-round magazine of 5.56 Remington hollow point ammo is a variation of the civilian .223 hunting round. Like the .223, it is designed to maximize nerve shock and blood loss.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the economical choice for target shooting, hunting, or stopping potential long-range muggings. These 42 rounds of 50 grain .223 JHP can save your life and your pocket book.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 42 rounds of NATO standard light full metal jacket ammunition have the ability to tumble within its target to create a much larger wound than what is normally expected from a such small bullet.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 42-round magazine is filled with our NATO standard 5.56mm. This round's steel penetrator makes it possible to beat all but the best in today's body armor.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If 42 rounds of Glaser Safety ammo fail to make your point, the conversation wasn't worth having to begin with.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Forty-two rounds of frangible fun. All of the man-stopping power, none of the over-penetration.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Burst fire doesn't have to be a guessing game anymore with 42 rounds of tracer ammo.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Tracer ammo ensures putting those shots on target when it counts.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This match grade ammo will add extra range to your 5.56mm assault rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Close only counts with horseshoes and hand-grenades, for an extra edge load up on match ammunition.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Added expansion in a quiet 42 round package.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Extra punch minus the noise with this 5.56mm ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Pump em' full of holes without waking up the countryside. Cold loaded ammo is 40% quieter than standard ball rounds.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 42-round magazine of ammunition will leave your enemies as cold as the rounds themselves, and is as silent as an Artic wind.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This kit can be used to store all kinds of medical equipment like boosters, canteen, and first aid kit.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Handy compact kit for medical equipment. Comes with a regeneration booster.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Even more compact than the P228, this gun is easily concealed.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Want something more compact than a P228? The P239 SAS makes for easy concealed carrying with SIG's reduced snag design.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A new version of the AUG, this one is chambered for the 6.8mm SPC caliber and comes with Picatinny rails.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This latest version of the famous Steyr AUG has rails instead of a fixed optical sight and foregrip. Chambered in the new 6.8x43mm SPC caliber.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A shorter version of the standard HK 416.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is just a HK 416 with a shorter barrel, for those who often do CQB.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Long in use with the Italian Police, this is an easy to use SMG.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The built-in foregrip on this older Beretta SMG lets you handle the gun easily even if the folding stock has not been deployed.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A panel with four individual pockets to store up to four 40mm grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Four pockets mounted on a panel that can be clipped to your load bearing equipment. The long adjustable straps let you store 40mm grenades on any length.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A sniperized version of the Galil assault rifle. More like a DMR than a real sniper rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This was a standard Galil, until someone decided to make a sniper rifle from it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This has a barrel that is slightly longer than on the standard HK 416.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you want more range than a standard 416 has, take this one.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A rather simple and fullauto-only SMG.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Adopted by the Australian army who considered it to be more reliable than the Thompson SMG. Top-feeding magazine precludes alternative sights, though.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The DMR variant of the HK 416.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A Designated Marksman Rifle based on the Heckler & Koch 416.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is Heckler & Koch's competitor to FN's FiveseveN.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The companion pistol to the HK MP7 PDW. These are pre-production models that may deviate from serial production.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Actually a M1 Carbine in a new dress.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A very new weapon for an old caliber, the HEZI is quite effective for its odd shape.

ITEM.szItemDesc: When the Germans build up the Bundeswehr they took the MG42, renamed it MG3, and took down the firing rate somewhat. Because, it was still the best GPMG of the world at that time. In use in several other countries as well.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Despite various nicknames, this is a dead serious gun. With attachment points for both a bipod or a tripod, an Anti-Air sight, and very easily replaced barrels, you can see why this is THE General Purpose Machine Gun.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The LMG version of the M4 assault rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Ares changed the M4 assault rifle to a LMG with a completely new upper receiver. Comes with a foregrip for better control during fullauto.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 7.62x51mm version of the HK 416.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the 7.62x51mm version of Heckler & Koch's new HK 416.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The action of Beretta's Storm pistol inside a rifle stock.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A futuristic looking rifle firing an unsurpassed pistol round, the .45ACP. This version has a magazine well that accepts hi-cap magazines.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A vest designed for carrying quite some of the most important consumables on a battlefield: ammo.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Tactical Tailor Assault Vest is for primary combat soldiers, and can carry 12 AR magazines, or whatever you need.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A panel with four individual pockets to store up to four 40mm grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A quadruple pouch mounted on a leg rig. The long adjustable straps let you store 40mm grenades on any length.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A double pouch that can carry two long non-standard mags.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A pouch for carrying two longer magazines (like P90-mags) strapped to the upper thigh.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A large pouch that can carry an ammo box.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This pouch is designed to hold the ammo box for your machinegun. Mounted onto a leg rig.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A vest that is designed to carry magazines mostly.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A tactical vest that can carry an assortment of AR and pistol magazines.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A versatile vest with pockets of different sizes, 4 of them designed especially for 40mm grenades.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Your dedicated grenadier will love this vest, with its four 40mm grenade pockets. Although it's a police vest, you need not necessarily load only tear gas...

ITEM.szItemDesc: A German assault vest.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A German assault vest. What you can't see on the picture is the large pocket at the left side, near the back of the vest.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A very versatile vest.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The high number of pockets of various sizes lets you carry a lot of different things. Russian ingenuity at its best.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A vest with mostly AR magazine pockets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is a vest for the primary combat soldier, who needs lots of rifle magazines.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A versatile Russian special forces vest.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Designed for carrying magazines, grenades, and a few other things, this is the Russian special forces vest.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A vest with two larger pockets for carrying some big things.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Tactical Tailor Utility Vest is for those who are not primary combat soldiers, but have other duties as well.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Several pouches mounted onto a harness.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Load Bearing Equipment lets you carry your equipment into battle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A tactical holster that rides on the upper thigh, it has a pocket for a spare magazine.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Eagle SAS Tactical Holster carries a medium pistol and a spare magazine.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A leg rig outfitted with a medium pistol holster and a triple pistol mag pouch.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Tactical Tailor Leg Rig can carry a pistol and three magazines.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A leg rig for large pistols or small machinepistols. Can carry two additional magazines.
ITEM.szBRDesc: With this Holster you can strap a small machinepistol or large pistol to your upper thigh. Has a pocket for two additional magazines.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The backpack part of the TIMS set. You can mount the combat pack onto it in place of the flap.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you want to carry all sorts of big things cross-country, you'll need a backpack like this one. Can be worn in conjunction with a TIMS combat pack.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A backpack with two outer pockets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: For a little bit of more organization, the ARUC backpack has two outer pockets for those items you need fast at hand.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A backpack with lots of outer pockets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: You do not want to rummage through the main compartment of your backpack for that elusive piece of gear that always sits at the bottom? This one has lots of outer pockets, to store your items for easy access.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is the combat pack partner to the TIMS backpack.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This combat pack can be worn in conjunction with the TIMS backpack, so you may want to have a look at the backpack as well.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A combat pack with an extra pocket on the outside.
ITEM.szBRDesc: You want storage capacity to lug some things around during combat, but a backpack slows you down to much. This smaller combat pack may be the solution to your needs.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A multi-pocket combat pack.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you need to carry a very diverse assortment of goodies into combat, this is the combat pack for you!

With this vest an operative will remain uncovered for the most time, but vulnerable to large caliber weapons. Treated with C-18 for added protection.

A combination of a double AR-Mag pouch with three grenade pouches.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This leg rig mounts a double AR-magazine pouch and three individual grenade pouches. Great for your primary combat soldiers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A combination of a double AR-Mag pouch and a utility pouch.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A double AR-magazine pouch and a larger utility pouch mounted together on a leg rig, this is useful for carrying larger things like explosives.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Here a utility pouch was combined with a canteen pouch.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This leg rig has a utility pouch mounted besides a canteen pouch.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A combination of a utility pouch with three grenade pouches.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Here we have a utility pouch combined with three individual grenade pouches.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This combo has a utility pouch with two pouches for oddly shaped magazines.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This leg rig offers a utility pouch together with two large mag pouches for those extremely long P90 or G11 magazines (or similar odd magazines).

ITEM.szItemDesc: A combination of two large magazine pouches with two grenade pouches.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This leg rig mounts two large magazine pouches combined with two individual grenade pouches.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A vest as it is often used by hunters and photographers.
An ugly SMG developed with reliability as its main focus (besides spitting lead).
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Italian SMG is very reliable due to some very interesting design features, like forcing air around the barrel with every shot to keep it cool.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An older French SMG that can be folded down to a small package.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is a fullauto-only French Army SMG, unlike the police versions that have semiauto, too. The magazine well can be folded along the barrel for easy storage and acts as a foregrip.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This old Swiss SMG is fullauto-only and quite heavy, but its range is up to par with modern SMGs.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This old Swiss SMG is fullauto-only and quite heavy, but its range is up to par with modern SMGs. It was developed in the 1930s by Adolf Furrer, manager of SIG Armory at Bern, Switzerland.

ITEM.szItemDesc: German scope for the Gewehr 98 and the Karabiner 98k.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This vintage scope will fit the German Mauser WW-II rifles.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A sniper scope used during WW-II.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A WW-II era scope of British manufacture, this was also used by other allied forces during that war.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Russian WW-II era scope.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Simply THE scope to mount onto the Mosin-Nagant rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These match sights have been made for precision during competition shooting.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fully adjustable iron sights to go with a Colt 1911, Glock, HK USP, or SIG pistol.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This shirt is designed to go under a ballistic vest, therefore DPM is only on the visible parts.
ITEM.szBRDesc: There's no need to have a fully camoed shirt when you wear a ballistic vest over it anyway, so this shirt was designed for use with those vests.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A set of forward Picatinny Rails and a rail to replace the carrying grip
ITEM.szBRDesc: Change your G36/G36K/MG36 to a more versatile gun with this set of Picatinny Rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A carrying grip with integrated optics and a standard handguard.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The G36 standard equipment: Handguard and Carry Grip with mounted dual optics.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Not as bulky or heavy as other LMG's, this gun still has a rate of fire that will frappe an enemy in no time.
ITEM.szBRDesc: HK has blessed us with their new versatile, multi-role squad machine gun. This version has the Bundeswehr grip with integrated optics.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Designed by the Compania de Estudios Tecnicos de Materiales Especiales, the Ameli looks as if it was derived from the MG42, but its mechanism is quite different.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Ameli we have in stock are the 'light-bolt'-versions with a higher rate of fire than the 'heavy-bolt'-model. Comes with bipod.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A flare normally used for emergency purposes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Brighter than chemical lightsticks, but also comparatively short-lived, these flares can light up the night for you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Almost as light as some heavier pistols, this is the ideal sidearm for the modern Private Military Contractor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A new PDW on the market, this little beauty was made by the Knight Armament Corporation and fires the new 6x35mm round.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Yet another new 6x35mm PDW, and a very effective one.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Just out of prototype stage, this new PDW is chambered for 6x35mm ammo. The SciFi-look belittles its effectiveness, though.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Automag is chambered for the .50 AE caliber.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The .50 Action Express version of Galena's line of Automag pistols.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Intended to replace the pistol as the sidearm, this gun was more often used as a light rifle during WW-II.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The good old M1 Carbine, still on the market for WW-II enthusiasts and gun collectors.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A very sturdy revolver, the Python has a reputation for accuracy.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The first 'modern' revolver after WW-II, it was made in several versions.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Despite having stopping power in a small package, this was a not so popular gun, due to high maintenace requirements and low controllability in fullauto fire.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An even shorter version of the G3KA4 battle rifle, this was made in Great Britain for the SAS.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This vest has a pistol holster incorporated.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Tactical Tailor 1E Vest is useful if your legs already carry some rigs, but you still want to pack a pistol. The holster on this vest will fit most standard pistols.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Either as a companion to the Ghillie suit or on its own, the Ghillie Hood camouflages your most important piece of equipment: your head.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The finishing touch for your ghillie suit. Also usefull to keep the sun out of your eyes and as mosquito net.

ITEM.szItemDesc: High Quality Jute Thread is sewn directly on to Military BDU trousers. The sewn on Jute thread covers the back and the front.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Unless you plan to wear jeans under your Ghillie suit, these pants are a must have if you are going for a covert approach.

ITEM.szItemDesc: High Quality Jute Thread is sewn directly on to a Military BDU 4 pocket coat. The sewn on Jute thread covers the entire jacket in the front and the back, and has an attached hood.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Whether you are spying on that cute looking girl next door, or sneaking up to that perfect spot overlooking an enemy base, this vest will make sure nobody sees you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A clip-on holster for revolvers and large pistols, with two separate speedloader pockets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This holster can be clipped onto your equipment and fits revolvers and large pistols. Comes with two separate speedloader pockets that are also of the clip-on type.

ITEM.szItemDesc: What a Rail Kit and a bit of black paint can do to your SL8! Now you can mount a few goodies that would not fit on a standard one.
ITEM.szBRDesc: What a Rail Kit and a bit of black paint can do to your SL8! Now you can mount a few goodies that would not fit on a standard one.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A durable tool for fixing pipes and obnoxious people.
This vest can take 2 ammobelts for your machinegun, or several drums.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Your machinegunner will love this vest, provided he's strong enough to wear it when it is filled to capacity.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This leg rig has a first aid pouch with several small belt loops for the neat storage of syringes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Great for storing a first aid kit with additional syringes of whatever stimulants your troops need.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This leg rig has a first aid pouch with several small belt loops for the neat storage of syringes, and also carries a canteen.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Great for storing a first aid kit with additional syringes of whatever stimulants your troops need. Also keeps a canteen handy.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A leg panel with a canteen pouch and three grenade pouches
ITEM.szBRDesc: This panel is equipped with a canteen pouch and three grenade pouches.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A modular leg rig panel with an AR-Mag. pouch, canteen pouch, and two grenade pouches.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A sub-version of one of our other leg rigs, this panel replaces one grenade pouch with a canteen pouch.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A leg panel with a canteen pouch, a grenade pouch, and two pouches for unusually long magazines.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This panel has a canteen pouch instead of the second grenade pouch of our other large magazine pouch setup.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A really big box of ammunition. I don't think this will fit in your backpack...
ITEM.szBRDesc: We are now providing several types of ammunition in bulk. Please note the prices and weights of ammunition crates before purchasing.

When attached to the end of a shotgun barrel, causes shot fired from the shotgun to group tighter, permiting longer range and more shot to hit the target.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When attached to the end of a shotgun barrel, causes shot fired from the shotgun to group tighter, permiting longer range and more shot to hit the target.

ITEM.szItemDesc: When attached to the end of a shotgun barrel, causes shot fired from the shotgun to group much tighter, permiting longer range and more shot to hit the target. Not for use with slugs!
ITEM.szBRDesc: When attached to the end of a shotgun barrel, causes shot fired from the shotgun to group much tighter, permiting longer range and more shot to hit the target. Not for use with slugs!

ITEM.szItemDesc: When attached to the end of a shotgun barrel, causes slugs to fire more accurately and farther. However, shot will fire in a very wide, ineffective pattern.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Makes your slugs to fire long and straight, but throws shot all over tarnation!

ITEM.szItemDesc: A new upper receiver for the 5.7x28mm round, placed onto a M16 lower receiver. This configuration uses standard P90-magazines. The longer barrel gets more range out of this round than the P90 does, however.
A new upper receiver for the 5.7x28mm round, placed onto a M16 lower receiver. This configuration uses standard P90-magazines.

A new upper receiver for the 5.7x28mm round, placed onto a M16 lower receiver. This configuration uses standard P90-magazines. As the barrel is just 6" long, range is just a bit more than most pistols.
Upper receiver to change a M4A1 or M4 Commando into an AR57 16".
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you want to shoot the 5.7x28mm round but still want the ergonomics of the M4 series, take this new upper receiver and mount it onto your old M4 Commando or M4A1 lower receiver. This one comes with a 16" barrel.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Upper receiver to change a M4A1 or M4 Commando into an AR57 11".
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you want to shoot the 5.7x28mm round but still want the ergonomics of the M4 series, take this new upper receiver and mount it onto your old M4 Commando or M4A1 lower receiver. Comes with a 11" barrel.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Upper receiver to change a M4A1 or M4 Commando into an AR57 6"-S, the silenced version of the AR57.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you want to shoot the 5.7x28mm round but still want the ergonomics of the M4 series, take this new upper receiver and mount it onto your old M4 Commando or M4A1 lower receiver. This is the silenced version, combining a Gemtech suppressor with a 6" barrel.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Added expansion in a quiet 30 round package.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Extra punch minus the noise with this 5.45mm ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Pump em' full of holes without waking up the countryside. Cold loaded ammo is 40% quieter than standard ball rounds.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 30-round magazine of ammunition will leave your enemies as cold as the rounds themselves, and is as silent as an Artic wind.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 45-round mag contains 5.45 subsonic jacketed hollow point ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 45-round mag contains 5.45 subsonic jacketed hollow point ammunition.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 45-round mag holds 5.45 light full metal jacket subsonic ammo.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 45-round mag holds 5.45 light full metal jacket subsonic ammo.

ITEM.szBRDesc: Silent light full metal jacket ammo for Eastern Bloc guns.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Subsonic hollow point rounds for use with 7.62x39mm Warsaw-Pact weapons.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you own an AK and want to be a silent warrior, then this ammo is for you.
